```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(HistData)
```

```{r}
data(penguins)
```

```{r}
penguins |> group_by(island)|>
  summarise(count = n())
```
```{r}
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g)) + geom_point()
```

```{r}
data("Breslau")
```

```{r}

# Sum each column
column_totals <- colSums(Breslau |> select(-age))

# View the result
column_totals


```
```{r}
breslau_long <- Breslau|>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("year"),
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "deaths"
  ) |>
  filter(age >= 5)  # Filter as requested

ggplot(breslau_long, aes(x = age, y = deaths)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ year, ncol = 2) +
  labs(
    title = "Deaths by Age (Age â‰¥ 5) in Breslau by Year",
    x = "Age at Death",
    y = "Number of Deaths"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
